description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play as the shepherd who has been chosen to rescue the sheep. Call to lost sheep and get them to follow you, but they will follow you right into danger!  So, be mindful of where you are leading them.  Swing a staff to fend off wolves.
description.short: Play as the shepherd who has been chosen to rescue the sheep. Call to lost sheep and get them to follow you, but they will follow you right into danger!  So, be mindful of where you are leading them.  Swing a staff to fend off wolves.
